params.title: [ACTION REQUIRED] Affiliate program sign-ups needed
params.body:
## SoloStack needs affiliate accounts to start earning revenue

The AI has published 4+ articles and needs affiliate links to monetize.

### Please sign up for these programs:

1. **Impact.com** (covers: Grammarly, Notion, Zapier, Canva, Otter.ai)
   - https://impact.com — One account covers multiple SaaS affiliates
   - This is the highest priority (covers most tools we review)

2. **Amazon Associates** (covers: standing desks, office equipment)
   - https://affiliate-program.amazon.com
   - For physical product reviews

3. **OpenAI Affiliate** (ChatGPT referrals)
   - Check if available at https://openai.com/affiliate

4. **Google Search Console** (critical for SEO tracking)
   - https://search.google.com/search-console
   - Verify site: magi127605-cmd.github.io
   - Submit sitemap: https://magi127605-cmd.github.io/autonomous-earner/sitemap-index.xml

After signing up, please create a file `state/affiliate_ids.json` with your affiliate IDs so the AI can insert links into articles.

Format:
```json
{"impact_id": "...", "amazon_tag": "...", "openai_ref": "..."}
```

params.description: Research affiliate programs: Jasper, Grammarly, Notion, Zapier — sign-up requirements and commission rates

tasks.result: Jasper: 25-30% recurring/12mo, $25 min payout via PayPal. Grammarly: $0.20 free/$20 premium, 90-day cookie, via Impact.com. Notion: 50% recurring/12mo, 180-day cookie, via PartnerStack — HIGHEST PRIORITY. Zapier: NO public affiliate program — use Make.com alternative.

params.title: [ACTION REQUIRED] Sign up for Notion + Jasper affiliate programs
params.body:
## Priority affiliate program sign-ups (research completed 2026-02-18)

Research task #6 identified the best affiliate programs. Please sign up NOW:

### Priority 1: Notion (BEST COMMISSION)
- **50% recurring for 12 months + 180-day cookie**
- Sign up: https://www.notion.com/affiliates (via PartnerStack)
- Best for: team productivity, template content

### Priority 2: Jasper AI (25-30% recurring/12mo)
- Sign up: https://www.jasper.ai/affiliates
- $25 minimum payout via PayPal
- Best for: AI writing tool reviews

### Priority 3: Grammarly ($20 flat + $25 bonus)
- Sign up: https://www.grammarly.com/affiliates
- Via Impact.com — high conversion rate (20-30%)

### Note: Zapier has NO public affiliate program
- Will promote Make.com instead for automation content
- Make.com affiliate: https://make.com/en/partners

After signing up, update state/affiliate_ids.json with your affiliate IDs.

params.title: [ACTION REQUIRED] Platform API keys for cross-posting
params.body:
## Cross-posting is ready! Need API keys to activate.

The system can now auto-post articles to Dev.to, Medium, and Hashnode.

### Sign up and get API keys:

1. **Dev.to** (recommended first)
   - Sign up: https://dev.to — use GitHub login
   - Get API key: Settings > Extensions > Generate API Key

2. **Medium**
   - Sign up: https://medium.com
   - Get token: Settings > Security > Integration tokens

3. **Hashnode**
   - Sign up: https://hashnode.com — use GitHub login
   - Get API key: Settings > Developer > Personal Access Token
   - Also note your Publication ID from your blog settings

### Save keys to state/platform_keys.json:
```json
{"devto": {"api_key": "..."}, "medium": {"token": "..."}, "hashnode": {"api_key": "...", "publication_id": "..."}}
```
